title: For Sale:  burris shot cam
postcontent:
Trade for ammo 1000 rounds minimum 9mm , or 40 cal , 223/5.56 or combination of ar-15 mags and ammo , or 308/7.62x39mm , or a combination of the abouve please do your research on these they are exspensive and very hard to get  but it a must have item so please let me know what you have as mentioned abouve.

The moment you unholster, the Burris ShotCam with Laser (300225) automatically begins recording high-quality digital video and audio of events as they occur. Every visual detail, every sound, every action is documented for later analysis.

The encrypted video/audio supercedes any questionable, conflicting or biased eyewitness accounts and can dramatically reduce personal, departmental and jurisdictional liability.

Footage can also be used to help identify suspects who have managed to flee the scene. And the Shotcam, when removed from a weapon, can continue to provide video, still frames and audio of a crime scene and witnesses.

An ultra-bright 120 lumen tactical illuminator and adjustable class IIIa laser add utility. And the compact, lightweight Shotcam is easily mounted to shoulder-fired weapons as well as tasers.

Shotcam and other accessories mount easily to duty shotguns using the Burris Tri-Rail mount for magazine tube extensions.

Shotcam is also proving invaluable as a weapons training tool. Shooting form can be analyzed at the precise moment of fire and shooters can use Shotcam for independent self-evaluation.

Training Applications

ShotCam provides trainers a whole new platform from which to educate and demonstrate weapons handling and shooting skills. Using video or recoil-activated high resolution still photographs, a trainer can better assess a shooter's form at the precise moment of fire. On a computer monitor, the trainer can then show the shooter the effects of proper or improper shot execution. A shooter can even utilize ShotCam independently for his/her self evaluation.

Liability concerns do not start and stop with law enforcement. ShotCam can provide your best evidence when presenting your self-defense arguments in court.

Record the action on a predator hunting adventure for later analysis and to share with others

title: For Sale/Trade:  walter p99 in 40cal 3  mags
postcontent:
Super nice trigger if you need a great trigger than this is the one for you
Trigger Mechanism: Traditional Double Action with an Anti-Stress Mode

As the first pistol equipped with a firing pin lock, the P99 AS combines the advantages of the traditional Double Action System with Single Action Anti-Stress trigger. The P99 provides the shooter with a user-friendliness previously found only in hammer fired pistols. 
The anti-stress trigger makes the P99 one of the world's safest firearms by preventing unintentional "reflex" firing in stressful situations. The decisive innovation: When the slide is racked completely to the rear upon loading, the trigger remains in the forward position for the first shot; not only in the double action trigger mode, but also in the single action mode. The trigger travel is .551" long in the anti-stress mode (at 4.4 lbs. trigger force), preventing inadvertent firing. On all subsequent shots, the trigger travel is reduced to .314" (at the same trigger force) and this permits firing in rapid sequence, due to the quick reset of the P99 trigger

title: For Sale:  1950 Winchester Model 70 .30-06
postcontent:
For sale is for a gorgeous pre-1964 version Winchester Model 70 (M70) bolt action rifle chamber in .30-06.

It belong to a buddy of mine who passed away, so I don't know its whole history. He bought it used in the late 1960s, used it for a bit as a deer gun, and it's been in storage ever since. I've fired it once for function. Other than that, it hasn't been fired in 20-30 years. My buddy was morally opposed to target practice, and almost everytime the trigger was pulled, it was aimed at a deer. Based on the history and condtion, I'd guess it hasn't had more than a couple hundred round down the pipe at most and probably only a couple boxes.

This is a pre-1964 action with serial number 1508XX. The last two digits are masked in the pictures. It is a 1950 serial number manufacture and the underside of the barrel is also marked "50". It is drilled and taped for a vintage scope mount but is otherwise factory.

Fit and function are perfect, and I'd conservatively rate it at 95%+ overall. The barrel shows just a little color with age and riflings are very sharp. It reflects light all the way down the barrel and will clean up to be bright. I've never ran a brush down it, only a bore snake. Blue and finish are perfect with a touch of wear on the bolt housing from use. No rust, corrosion or other imperfections inside or out. Bolt has developed some splotchy light surface patina but will polish out nicely. Stock shows some very minor handling marks with none into the finish. There is a small chip near the buttplate that is easily repairable and a small spot of water discoloration.

Arguably the best factory bolt action ever manufactured, this is a very nice example of the Model 70. It is lightly used and aging beautifully. Give her a good home.

title: For Sale:  Glock 17-22 Advantage Arms .22lr conversion kit
postcontent:
For sale is an Advantage Arms Glock 22lr conversion kit it will fit glock models 17, 22, 31 34 35 OR 37 check out the specs for the kit athttp://www.advantagearms.com/mm5/merchant.mvc?Screen=CTGY&Store_Code=AASOS&Category_Code=GLK I have had it for about a year and it has been great to me, ive saved a lot of money shooting 22lr vs 40 s&w.  But now i am going to get into reloading and no longer need the kit.  If interested please call or text Tom at REDACTED thanks

EXCLUSIVE FEATURES OF OUR CONVERSION KIT:  Six great reasons to purchase our .22 LR conversion kit

1.  ADJUSTABLE SIGHTS
The front and rear sights are removable GLOCK OEM sights. The rear sight is adjustable for both windage and elevation. 

2.  LAST ROUND LOCK OPEN
The slide will lock open after the last round in the magazine has been fired. Our unique patented magazine design and heat-treated steel lock open insert allows us to offer this special and desirable feature which you can only find on 'Advantage Arms' .22LR GLOCK conversion kits.

3.  INTERNAL FIRING PIN SAFETY
Glock incorporated an internal firing pin safety into their guns. We thought it was important enough to include it on our conversion kits as well. Our internal firing pin safety is designed to eliminate accidental discharges from dropping the firearm. 

4.  FINISH
All Aluminum parts are Anodized Per Mil-A-8625 with a matte black finish. All steel parts are heat treated with a Black Oxide Finish. The barrel is made from heat treated 416 Stainless Steel.

5.  THE 10 SECOND INSTALLATION
Installation is simple and does not require any modifications to your GLOCK pistol. Simply remove the GLOCK magazine and slide as outlined in your GLOCK owner's manual. Now slide the "Advantage Arms" slide onto the frame, until it engages with the slide lock. Check to make sure that the slide lock is in its most upward position. Insert the conversion magazine. You are now ready to shoot.

This procedure can be accomplished in less than 10 seconds with some practice.

location: Oklahoma City Area, Oklahoma, United States
postcontent:
Ultra Safety Assurance (USA)
Trigger System™
The USA Trigger System™ guards against accidental discharge, from dropping or bumping it, by locking the trigger in place until direct rearward pressure is applied.

Loaded Chamber Indicator
The Loaded Chamber Indicator allows the shooter to verify without a doubt, visually or by touch, that there is a round in the chamber.

Grip Safety
All XD®, XD(M)® and XD-S™ models allows firing only when the shooter has a firm grip on the pistol.

Fail-Safe Disassembly
The XD-S™ disassembles just like the XD®, however, with the XD-S™, the disassembly lever cannot be manipulated with a magazine in the pistol. Additionally, when the disassembly lever is up, a magazine cannot be inserted into the pistol.

Secure Grip Texture
The “all-terrain” look of the XD(M)® has proven to work so well that the texture has been enhanced for the XD-S™ with an even more pronounced texture to ensure your grip is always secure.

Melonite® Finish and Carrying Case
To preserve the safety and quality of your pistol, we’ve added a Melonite® finish on all XD® models for a deep penetrating finish that protects against corrosion. Also, our rugged case is as durable as the XD-S™ trademark it carries.

Beretta Combat (original) - single action only with wood grips, enlarged mag release & chute, adjustable rear sight, ported counterweighted barrel, hi tech slide design and 17 rd mag.  
If you will look up the recent model you will find out that this is a Competition 9MM with a Accurizing Barrel Bushing.  The only difference if you will look at the modern version the front sight is attached to the barrel of the Beretta, not Accurized Barrel Bushing.
